name: The Quest For Infamy Companion - Art/Strategy/Hint Book
blurb: A fully illustrated art book and strategy guide and hint book - complete with decoder window - for Infamous Quest's "Quest For Infamy!"

rewards.reward: HELPING HAND LEVEL: A personal thanks from us on our website - and a personal email from Bt.
DIGITAL BOOK TIER 1 : eCopy of the Book - Your choice of PDF, Kindle, Nook Version, ePub
PHYSICAL BOOK TIER 1:\r\nSoftcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book.  Comes with custom red-window decoder.
DIGITAL BOOK plus DIGITAL COPY OF GAME -  eCopy of the Book - Your choice of PDF, Kindle, Nook Version, ePub & digital download of "Quest For Infamy" - DRM free from The Humble Store

PHYSICAL & DIGITAL BOOK TIER 1: Softcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book. Comes with custom red-window decoder PLUS eCopy of the Book - Your choice of .PDF, Kindle, Nook Version, ePub

PHYSICAL & DIGITAL BOOK TIER 1:\r\nSoftcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book. Comes with custom red-window decoder PLUS eCopy of the Book - Your choice of  .PDF, Kindle, Nook Version, ePub

PHYSICAL & DIGITAL BOOK plus DIGITAL DOWNLOAD GAME TIER: Softcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book. Comes with custom red-window decoder PLUS eCopy of the Book - Your choice of .PDF, Kindle, Nook, ePub Version AND THE GAME -Digital Download of DRM-Free copy of "Quest For Infamy" from Infamous Quests.

PHYSICAL BOOK COPY & PHYSICAL DVD-CASE GAME: Softcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book. Comes with custom red-window decoder PLUS a Physical Copy of the Game, Quest For Infamy, on DVD, in Case with artwork and manual.

HARDCOVER PHYSICAL COPY OF BOOK + Digital Copy of Book - Your choice of .pdf, Kindle or Nook, ePub. - Get a hardcover version of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" as well as a digital copy for your portable reader.  Hardcover edition features beautiful hard-cover and variant artwork.
HARDCOVER COPY + SOFTCOVER COPY + DIGITAL of Quest For Infamy Companion.  Get both PHYSICAL editions of this game, with variant covers! One of the shelf, one for the coffee table! Awesome!

SUPER SUPPORTER\r\n\r\nPHYSICAL BOOK COPY & DIGITAL BOOK COPY w/ SPECIAL KICKSTARTER EDITION QUEST FOR INFAMY BIG-BOX: Softcover copy of "The Quest For Infamy Companion" - full color art book and hint book. Comes with custom red-window decoder and your choice of .pdf, Kindle, Nook, ePub version - along with COLLECTORS EDITION BIG-BOX Quest For Infamy GAME.  Only available through Kickstarter, this Big, classic style box includes original artwork by Jenny Pattison on cover, inside - game manual "The History of The Kingdom of Lonaria" and full sized printed game map.

ULTIMATE SUPPORTER HARDCOVER PHYSICAL COPY OF BOOK + Digital Copy of Book - Your choice of .pdf, Kindle, ePub or Nook.  Digital Download of "Quest For Infamy" game & DVD CASE VERSION OF QUEST FOR INFAMY! w/ Manual/Map .\r\nHARDCOVER EDITION will be inscribed to you, personally, by Steven "Bt" Alexander (and maybe mystery guests?)

THE DISTINCTIVE SUPPORT - HARDCOVER PHYSICAL COPY OF BOOK + SOFTCOVER EDITION + Digital Copy of Book - your choice of .pdf, Kindle, ePub or Nook. Also, Digital Download of "Quest For Infamy" game. PORTRAIT PRINT OF CHARACTER FROM GAME, suitable for framing. HARDCOVER EDITION will be inscribed to you, personally, by Steven "Bt" Alexander (and maybe mystery guests?)

HARDCOVER PHYSICAL COPY OF BOOK + digital Copy of Book - your choice of .pdf, Kindle, ePub or Nook. Also, Digital Download of "Quest For Infamy" game and COLLECTOR'S BIG BOX EDITION - the physical version of the game, in a classic style big box.  HARDCOVER EDITION and BIG BOX will be inscribed to you, personally, by Steven "Bt" Alexander (and maybe mystery guests?) PLUS COLLECTORS EDITION BIG-BOX Quest For Infamy GAME. Only available through Kickstarter, this Big, classic style box includes original artwork by Jenny Pattison on cover, inside - game manual "The History of The Kingdom of Lonaria" and full sized printed game map. All physical items sent will be numbered and part of an exclusive collection.\r\n\r\n[Hardcover Edition of QFI Companion & Big Box Edition of QUEST FOR INFAMY & Digital download of QFI & The QFI Companion]

Also, Digital Download of "Quest For Infamy" game. HARDCOVER EDITION will be inscribed to you, personally, by Steven "Bt" Alexander (and maybe mystery guests?) PLUS  COLLECTORS EDITION BIG-BOX Quest For Infamy GAME. Only available through Kickstarter, this Big, classic style box includes original artwork by Jenny Pattison on cover, inside - game manual "The History of The Kingdom of Lonaria" and full sized printed game map.  All physical items sent will be numbered and part of an exclusive collection.

THE ABSOLUTE "INFAMOUS" COLLECTORS TIER: HARDCOVER PHYSICAL COPY OF BOOK + SOFTCOVER EDITION + Digital Copy of Book - your choice of .pdf, Kindle, ePub or Nook. Also, Digital Download of "Quest For Infamy" game. HARDCOVER EDITION will be inscribed to you, personally, by Steven "Bt" Alexander (and maybe mystery guests?) PLUS COLLECTORS EDITION BIG-BOX Quest For Infamy GAME. Only available through Kickstarter, this Big, classic style box includes original artwork by Jenny Pattison on cover, inside - game manual "The History of The Kingdom of Lonaria" and full sized printed game map. In addition, you will get one 8x12 Canvas Printing of Your Choice of Artwork from Quest For Infamy. All physical items sent will be numbered and part of an exclusive collection. You will also be included in a sketch on the foreward page of the book, where your likeness will appear under the banner "This book could not have been made without the support of..."
